answerText: pressure [prompt on P][10] With Ludwig Hagen, this scientist names an equation from fluid dynamics which sets the change in pressure proportional to length of pipe and volumetric flow rate, and inversely proportional to the fourth power of the radius of the pipe.

question: Question:  [10]  Identify this quantity which is calculated as force over area.
